Solar Decathlon China 2017 Teams

22 teams from 44 universities and 12 countries will compete in Solar Decathlon China 2017 (listed alphabetically by team name):

News

25 Nov 2016

Internship Positions Open

Solar Decathlon China internship positions are currently open for non-decathletes! Qualified applicants are encouraged to submit resumes to support@sdchina.org.cn.

10 Nov 2016

The R.E.A.L. House made its first public appearance at Hunan Housing Industrialization and Green Building Industry Expo in Changsha. #Team Solar Offspring

20 Oct 2016

Headed by Prof. Fisch, solar decathletes from Technische Universität Braunschweig interacted with their Chinese partners at Southeast University in Nanjing. #Team SEU-TUBS
